ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50 Daphnia pulex 11.0 mg/L/48 hr (95% confidence limit, 8.2-14.7) @ 15 째C; first instar. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/L as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/L.
LC50 Lepomis macrochiris (Bluegill) 105 mg/L/96 hr @ 24 째C; 1.0 g. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/L as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/L.
LC50 Pteronarcys >1,000 mg/L/96 hr @ 15 째C; first year class. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/L as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/L.

LC50 Simocephalus 16.0 mg/L/48 hr (95% confidence limit, 11.4-22.4) @ 15 째C; first instar. Static bioassay without aeration, pH 7.2-7.5, water hardness 40-50 mg/L as calcium carbonate and alkalinity of 30-35 mg/L.
LC50 Japanese quail (12 days old) >5000 ppm/5 days (no mortality to 5000 ppm)
LC50 Ring-necked pheasant (10 days old) >5000 ppm/5 days (no mortality to 5000 ppm)
LC50 Mallard duck (10 days old) >5000 ppm/5 days (no mortality to 5000 ppm)
LC50 Adelotus brevis (Tusked frog, 1-2 wk old tadpoles) 11.1 g/L/24 hr; 5.2 g/L/48 hr; 4.2 g/L/96 hr; static bioassay /formulated product/
LC50 Limnodynastes peroni (Brown striped marsh frog, 1-2 wk old tadpoles) 3.3 g/L/24 hr; 2.5 g/L/48 hr; 2.0 g/L/96 hr; static bioassay /formulated product/
LC50 Cerastoderma edule (Cockle) >100 mg/L/48 hr; static /formulated product/
LC50 Platichthys flesus (Starry flounder) >100 mg/L/48 hr; static /formulated product/
LC50 Crangon crangon (Common shrimp, sand shrimp) >100 mg/L/48 hr; static /formulated product/
LC50 Gambusia affinis (Western mosquitofish) 26.6 g/L/24 hr; 23.1 g/L/48 hr; 19.1 g/L/96 hr; static /formulated product/
LC50 Poecilia reticulata (Guppy) 222.8 mg/L/96 hr; static /formulated product/
LC50 Rasbora trilineata (Scissortail rasbora) 135.2 mg/L/96 hr; static /formulated product/
LC50 Tilapia mossambica (Mozambique tilapia, fry: 1-1.5 cm) 1,122,018 ug/L/48 hr (95% confidence interval: 1,076,273-1,171,427 ug/L); static /Basfapon PO/
LC50 Tilapia mossambica (Mozambique tilapia, fingerlings: 2.5-4.5 cm) 1,595,880 ug/L/48 hr (95% confidence interval: 1,514,273-1,660,748 ug/L); static /Basfapon PO/
